thread.title: Online retailers compete in selling cowdung cakes
thread.title_full: Online retailers compete in selling cowdung cakes | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Online retailers compete in selling cowdung cakes
text:
Cow dung cakes Photo credit: ebay.in Now, cow dung cakes are available online and can be easily delivered to your doorstep. The e-tailers this festive season are trying to tap into the demands of every common household by selling "fresh and pure" cow dung cakes on their websites.
The cow dung cakes are available on various sites with a specific shape and neat packaging. They vary in sizes from 2.5 inches to 4 inches and come in different sets according to varying choice and requirements of the customers.
Cow dung cakes are mainly used in traditional Indian households for ceremonies, yagnas and different rituals. It is believed that burning of cow dung with ghee helps in purifying the air and releases oxygen.
The packs of 15 to 24 pieces range from Rs 150 to 545, certain e-commerce stores like Shopclues and Ebay are also offering discounts on the product.
The products are also available for shipping in foreign locations like Europe, USA and Asia where there is a huge NRI population.
